description: Today, Kattie Orr stops by to talk about internet company lobbying. Then, Leoneda Inge reports on the TSA’s competition to crowdsource improvements to airline security. Finally, we talk to Joseph Kosper, CEO of a company moving into a startup incubator for veteran owned businesses.
title: Marketplace Tech for Tuesday, July 29 2014
teaser: Today, Kattie Orr stops by to talk about internet company lobbying. Then, Leoneda Inge reports on the TSA’s competition to crowdsource improvements to airline security. Finally, we talk to Joseph Kosper, CEO of a company moving into a startup incubator for veteran owned businesses.
